Infant-baptism and church-membership proved: and also the mode of baptism to be by sprinkling &c. In answer to Mr. Benjamin Dennie's book. By Giles Shute of Limehouse. Shute, Giles, b. 1650 or 51.
72 p.
printed by J.R. and are to be sold by Nath. Hiller, at the Princes-Armes in Lenden-Hall-street; and at the author's-house in Limehouse, London : 1695.
Below imprint: Price three pence. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
